Доставка по Україні здійснюється Новою п: Delivery in Ukraine is carried out by Nova Poshta.
При оформленні замовлення до 14:00 товар: If the order is placed before 14:00, the item will be shipped on the same day (if available).
При оформленні замовлення після 14:00 то: If the order is placed after 14:00, the item will be shipped the next day (if available).
To NovaPoshta lockers: free for orders over 200 UAH.
Ha відділення: від 500 грн. безкоштовно,: To the branch: free for orders over 500 UAH, except for aquariums, aquarium substrates, cages, and large-sized goods. Wooden, silica gel, and mineral fillers are included in free delivery to the branch up to 30 kg, over 30 kg - at the buyer's expense.
Адресна доставка кур`єрами Нової пошти:: Address delivery by Nova Poshta couriers: free for orders over 1000 UAH.
Для замовлень на суму менше ніж 200 грн: For orders less than 200 UAH - delivery according to the operator`s tariffs.
Відправлення замовлень, що узгоджені з м: Orders confirmed with managers on Sunday will be dispatched on Monday.
Після відправки Вашого замовлення, номер: After sending your order, the number of the shipping and transport invoice will come to the phone indicated in the order in the form of an SMS. With this number, you will be able to receive the goods at the representation of the transport company in your city upon presentation of a passport.
При доставці товару будь-яким перевізник: When delivering goods by any carrier, the buyer is obliged to check the integrity and completeness of the goods directly in the carrier`s office. We always pack orders very carefully and only put high-quality and intact goods inside. However, sometimes the cargo gets damaged during transportation. In case of defects, you should act in accordance with the carrier`s internal rules.
При отриманні товару у компанії-перевізн: When receiving the goods from the carrier company:
Оглянути цілісність посилки безпосереднь: Inspect the integrity of the package directly at the Nova Poshta branch.
Звірити кількість місць в TTH з фактично: Check the number of places in TTH with the actually received.
Перевірити цілісність упаковки (звертайт: Check the integrity of the packaging (pay attention to tears, dents, indentations).
Розкрити упаковку, звірити вміст з товар: Open the package, check the contents with the invoice, and inspect for any damages.
У разі виявлення пошкоджень або недостач: If you find any damages or shortages, you need to call us at 080000000 and immediately at the carrier`s office, draw up a claim act, in which you should record the condition of the packaging, the presence of markings on the packaging (fragile), and describe the damages or missing items.
Якщо Ви, при складанні акта, вказуєте се: If you, when drawing up the act, indicate yourself as the recipient of compensation, the replacement of the damaged goods or refund is not made. Remember that claims to the carrier for missing places, transportation costs, and damages are made by the recipient.
При недотриманні вище перелічених пункті: If the above points are not followed, we do not accept claims for damaged or lost goods.
Зверніть увагу, що Ваше замовлення збері: Please note that your order is stored in the carrier`s office for 4 days, and on the 5th day, the order is automatically returned to the sender.
Так, Ви можете замовити адресну доставку: Yes, you can request address delivery in your locality. The delivery will be carried out by Nova Poshta couriers. The cost of delivery will remain the same * and will also be 59 UAH*. Lifting bulky goods from 30 to 100 kg is paid separately. Cost of lifting: 20-60 UAH / floor depending on weight, dimensions, and complexity of the lift.
Чи можу я замовити доставку у поштомат Н: Can I request delivery to a Nova Poshta locker?
Reference on the Nova Poshta website.
Так. Ви маєте таку можливість. Термін зб: Yes, you have this option. The storage period is 3 calendar days. After that, the parcel will be moved to the nearest Nova Poshta branch to the locker.
Як оплатити послуги доставки у поштомат?: How to pay for delivery services at the locker?
Послуги доставки можна оплатити за допом: Delivery services can be paid using the Nova Poshta mobile app or on the company`s website. Please note that it is not possible to pay in cash on the spot, as the locker does not have the technical capabilities for this.
Оплату товару ви можете здійснити зручни: You can pay for the goods in a way that is convenient for you:
онлайн-оплата банківською картою Visa аб: online payment by Visa or MasterCard or using payment systems Apple Pay or Google Pay;
післяплатою у відділені Нової Пошти (зве: cash on delivery at the New Mail branch (please note that in case of payment upon receipt, an additional fee of 2% + 20 UAH from New Mail will be included in the cost of the service);
Ми рекомендуємо перевіряти товар на цілі: We recommend checking the product for integrity, completeness, and quality characteristics upon receipt. If you find any defects, you can contact the manager of our store, and we will resolve this issue. In such cases, we guarantee you a refund or exchange of the goods for a similar one. Read more about this in the section 'Refund/Exchange'.
Повернення або обмін товарів для домашні: The return or exchange of goods for pets of proper quality is not separately regulated by the Law of Ukraine 'On Consumer Protection'.
До зоотоварів застосовні ті ж правила, я: The same rules apply to pet products as to the corresponding groups of goods intended for human use. You can return or exchange the product within 14 days after the delivery of your order. If you have purchased any item for your pet that does not fit in size, style, color, or characteristics, you have the right to contact the online store Vmiske.ua within 14 (fourteen) days, starting from the next day after the delivery of the order, and demand, on legal grounds, the exchange of the product or the return of the amount spent, if there is no similar corresponding product and there are no other alternatives for exchange.
При цьому, є кілька вимог:: In this case, there are several requirements:
товарний вигляд і упаковка продукту не б: the appearance and packaging of the product were not damaged, all tags and labels are in place;
товар не був у вживанні: відсутні сліди: the product was not used: there are no signs of use, scratches, chips, abrasions, etc.;
товар складний в упаковку таким же чином: the product should be packed in the same way as when received;
замовлений Вами товар підлягає поверненн: the product you ordered is subject to return and exchange;
Які товари я не зможу повернути / обміня: What items can't I return / exchange?
якщо використовувалися нештатні режими а: if non-standard modes or parameters of operation of the equipment or its components were used (frequencies, voltages, etc.)
дефекти викликані використанням витратни: defects caused by the use of consumables that do not meet the requirements of operation;
виникло пошкодження, викликане потраплян: damage caused by the entry of foreign objects, substances, liquids, or insects inside the product;
виріб має виражені механічні і / або еле: the product has significant mechanical and/or electrical damage, obtained as a result of any actions of the buyer or third parties;
обладнання пошкоджено внаслідок природни: the equipment is damaged due to natural disasters, fires, floods, earthquakes, household factors, and other situations beyond the control of the seller;
вироби зазнали ремонту не уповноваженими: the products have been repaired by unauthorized persons in violation of the manufacturer's requirements and safety standards;
Продовольчі товари. До продовольчих това: Food products. Food products include all items that can be consumed by humans. Food items cannot be returned or exchanged for another product simply because they did not suit your taste or if you changed your mind about taking this particular product after making the purchase. Food products can be returned or exchanged if you find significant defects or violations of legal requirements. For example, if the product has passed its expiration date, if the packaging lacks mandatory information that should be provided on food products: labeling, manufacturing date, and expiration date, ingredient list in the consumer's language, caloric content, energy value, fat, protein, and carbohydrate content, information about the manufacturer with the name, location, and legal address, information about the representative authorized to sell this product, weight, and volume of the product. You can familiarize yourself with the full list of such products by following the link. These items can only be returned through the identification of a defect or a discrepancy in the order. Defective or substandard items. If you have received a product of substandard quality, please write to us at the email address info@vmiske.ua with the subject 'Exchange and Return', order number, contact phone number (if different from the one specified in the order), photo, and a detailed description of the situation.
Відповідно до постанови Кабінету міністр: In accordance with the resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers №172 dated March 19, 1994, on the implementation of certain provisions of the law of Ukraine 'On Consumer Protection', the following items are not subject to return:
товари медичного призначення: лікарські: medical items: medicines and devices for treatment: animals, medical clothing, saddle pads, bandages, etc. hygiene items;
товари для цуценят і кошенят (пелюшки, с: items for puppies and kittens (diapers, nipples, feeding bottles, drinkers, etc.); perfumery-cosmetic products and products in aerosol packaging;
Як оформити повернення / обмін?: How to process a return / exchange?
Ви можете написати нам на електронну адр: You can write to us at the email address
c темою `Обмін і повернення`, номером за: with the subject 'Exchange and return', order number, phone number for callback (if different from the one specified in the order), photo, and a detailed description of the situation. We will contact you within a day from the moment we receive the request.
протягом години після отримання заяви (в: within an hour after receiving the application (during working hours from 9:00 to 20:00, except Saturdays and Sundays), we will contact you at the phone number specified in the order.
Під час доставки вашого наступного замов: During the delivery of your next order, if there is one.
Транспортною компанією, якою було достав: By the transport company that delivered your order in your city.
Зверніть увагу: повернення або обмін тов: Please note: the return or exchange of goods is only possible after prior agreement with our manager. If the return or exchange is due to improper quality or a mismatch with the order, the return or exchange is at the expense of PrettyPaws. In case the return or exchange of the goods occurs NOT due to the fault of PrettyPaws, the transport services will be paid and will amount to 65 UAH.
Зверніть увагу: зробити повернення грошо: Please note: we will be able to make a refund or exchange of the goods within 1-2 business days from the moment of receiving the goods to our warehouse for assessing its appearance. Please note that all parcels sent by transport companies are insured. When receiving the parcel, it is necessary to check the integrity of its packaging and the absence of mechanical damages. Each request regarding exchange or return is considered individually.
